phrases: But I do not like it outside.
It is a garden that God created and where he gathered all the plants of the world.
They say that if you go there, you will see all the flowers that grow in this world.
Granny, let us go there together!
I would like to go but I am too old and my legs hurt.
And besides, this garden is my treasure so I cannot just leave it.
When you grow up, you should go look for it.
How can this story be so horribly hopeless?
Do not treat my manga like that.
Have you taken a look at the materials I gave you yesterday?
Why is it all children's stories?!
You are getting carried away with making fun of me!
I am not making fun of you, it is just suited for your intelligence.
I thought stuff like this would be easier for you to understand.
Are you implying that I am not suited for obediently sitting at my desk and studying?
That had not crossed my mind.
Do not you want to become an Exorcist?
I need to prepare for the lessons.
I received a request, and I am going shopping while I am out.
I do not think it will take long.
Will not it be much more educational for me than burying my nose in books?
But you are still a Page.
You do not have authorization for actual combat on that level.
Is not it too late to worry about that in my case?
Fine then, but just to observe.
Pay attention to what I tell you.
This is the key to the supply store.
It is one of the keys that only Exorcists can carry.
Does that key make us warp or something?
This academy is a very important place for the Order of True Cross.
So the Principal has used his power to set a maze of amulets and barriers to ward off demons.
I guess he is not just any ordinary clown.
You can avoid those traps and visit the world outside the academy if you have the keys.
You should take good care of the keys you are given.
They are very precious to us.
Well, I will go buy the supplies first.
I want to come with you.
Only Exorcists can enter the store.
Damn, he keeps treating me like I am just a brat!
Like he is my mother or something!
One day you will come asking for my help...
Oh crap, did it react to me?
I told you to stay away!
Valeriana, St. John's wort, fern, horehound...
And then one liter of C-concentration holy water.
And six dozen of my usual blessed silver-jacket bullets.
Buying in bulk again, I see?
I used up a lot the other day.
Her legs keep getting worse day by day.
But the doctors cannot find anything wrong with either her bones or muscles.
That is why I asked you here.
Unfortunately we are at odds right now.
She is not talking to me for the time being.
Do you think a demon could be involved in this?
It started when my mother... her grandmother died.
It is fertilizer made by mixing cow manure and water.
I am not good at digging deep holes like this, thanks for helping me!
First you call me a demon, then you make me work for you!
I did not know you were actually a nice guy.
Nice... I do not know about that, but...
Did not she touch poo just earlier?!
This garden used to be my Granny's.
She taught me a lot of things here.
I really like this garden, and I loved Granny...
But she died this winter in an accident.
I am sure she is gone ahead to the Garden of Amahara.
It would be great if she had...
It is a place where God has gathered all the plants and flowers of the world.
I know it is just a children's story but
if the Garden of Amahara really existed
you could find all the grass and flowers and trees there.
I would really like to go and see it.
You must not let your guard down!
She is the daughter of the owner of this shop.
This is my older twin brother.
But you look like you are the older one!
In truth I am more like a big brother than he is.
He is the older brother only formally.
What the hell do you mean formally?!
He would like to take a look at your legs.
I do not have anything to do with demons!
It is just to be certain.
If I do not find anything in my examination then there is no need to do anything.
This is definitely the work of a demon.
This is not a demon that is capable of possessing a human.
It has possessed a plant here in the garden.
Maybe a Dokkalfar, a Green Man or an Ent.
Some sort of low level demon that possesses the vegetation and
has reached a crack in Shiemi's heart through her legs.
Its real body is somewhere in this garden.
Shiemi, demons usually take advantage of finding a gap to enter by talking to people.
You must have talked to one.
Do you remember something like that?
I have not talked to a demon...
I do not care how much you prized your Granny,
it is not worth destroying your health to protect this garden.
Do not talk like that about the garden!
When the moon is waxing you plant the root crops,
and when it is waning you plant the leaf crops.
You really like grass and flowers, do not you Shiemi?
It may not seem like it,
but the demon is sucking her energy through her legs.
If we do not stop it soon, her life may be in danger.
Why is there such a room inside a warehouse?
Her grandmother lived in this warehouse.
After she passed away Shiemi has secluded herself in there.
Like she wants to be a part of the garden.
That was also when her legs started deteriorating.
She is just like her grandmother who had bad legs, too.
Did this place have something to do with why you are fighting?
Even now, her grandmother seems to be the only thing she is thinking of.
I am no good as a mother, and just as bad as a daughter.
Shiemi's been frail ever since she was little so she never went to school.
I was always busy with the store so her grandmother took care of her instead.
So Shiemi got very attached to her grandmother.
And yet, I always found that so enviable...
Well, you get what you deserve when even your own child has had enough of you.
It is way too late to try and act like a mother now and start worrying about her.
That way of thinking is a prime target for a demon to get in.
They take advantage of the weaknesses in people's hearts.
Will not you help me a bit?
The night is going to be cold.
I need to cover the grapes.
I am going to go look for the Garden of Amahara!
I have saved up some money!
Maybe there is enough to travel around the world!
But I do not think there is enough in that purse to travel around the world.
Go search for it somewhere nearby today.
I will cover the grapes when I am back, I promise!
Come back before it gets dark, okay?
And how am I going to fix this?
If this goes on your garden will wither and die.
You have to protect this garden.
I am the fairy of this garden.
I will give you as much strength as you want!
So please protect Granny's treasured garden!
It is already past the evening watering time.
I have to protect it... I have to.
You are doing gardening even at this hour?
She is being mean to me.
I decided that I would protect Granny's garden!
Why are you binding yourself to this place?
If I just had returned sooner...
I am sorry I am late!
If I had helped her with covering the grapes instead of going out...
It is my fault that she died.
So that is why I will protect her garden!
Trapped by her past, blaming only herself.
Then stop making your mother worry!
Besides, is not looking for the Garden of Amahara what you really want to do?!
Would your Granny want to keep you here instead?
And now my legs will not even move anymore!
I will chop those roots to pieces!
Sorry to interrupt this tender moment.
How long have you been there?
Our opponent is a small fry.
We will deal with it in a blink of an eye.
You will soon be able to use your legs again, Shiemi.
The rest was just a matter of your heart's resolve.
Is it going to show itself?
We will remain in this garden until we die!
So you are in full bloom this late at night, you bastard!
It is using her as a shield.
Could you give me a hand?
I already told you, I need a hand!
Guess I will have to, since you are younger and all...
And you went as far as to ask for me so nicely.
I am nothing like you, you stinking weed!
Do not bunch me together with the likes of you!
You are a vigorous one, Mister Big Brother.
Can a demon even be nothing but dirty?
If you are going to cut her, then go ahead!
It is all right to cut us up a little, as lovely as we are together.
I have no choice but to shoot her.
Do not try to deceive me.
Maybe it is so... and maybe it is not.
Well then... which one is it?
The roots are gone from your legs, too.
If you do not do it now, it will just be harder later.
I have looked for it once, too.
But what did you shoot her with, anyway?
They sting a bit when they hit.
So that is what it was.
I helped her... but it feels like she helped me, too.
We have a new private student.
I am just a weakling who knows nothing about the ways of the world,
so I thought I would train myself through cram school.
And Yuki... I mean Mister Okumura agreed.
Is that why you have started school?
And of course I wanted to see Yuki as teacher.
You are just messing around with girls...
I will be the one to defeat Satan!
The fun and games start here.
sei wo uke sorezore ga jinsei wo ouka
nou no black box wo shiru sore wa kou ka
you wa limit line wo subete ryouga
saa ikou ka fumidasu sore wa kyou da
yappa hibi wa ika sen kou sotsunaku konashitecha no no
stop nagare wo mikiwamena mazu mono to mo sezu ikou ze (here we go)
todokanu mono ya kagiri aru mono ni
atsuku naru mune wo osaetsukeru no wa
rikai mo sezu osaetsukeyou to shitekita
ano otonatachi to onaji jan ka yo
mune wo moyasu hi wa dare ni mo keseya shinai
sora kara furu kuroi ame ga kono mi nurashi furitomanakutomo
mada ore wa kawareru jibun de kaetemiseru
kore ga sou pride sorezore no basho de
mada mada kieru na kokoro no hi wo
mada mada ikeru zo ikeru zo
After birth, people live as they wish
They then learn the black box in their head; is that bliss?
Just cross over, beyond the line of your limit
Let us go, take a step, and I mean this minute
Life's a bitch, so if it is easy, you are doing it wrong
Stop, which way is the world going?
Then ignore it and go wherever (here we go)
There are things I could never have, things with time
Is there a reason I force my heart upon them?
I never tried to understand, I just forced it on them
I am no better than those lifeless adults
Even if it is just a pipe dream I could never have
But no one can put out the fire in my heart
The black rain may pour hard and leave me drenched
But I know I can change, I will change myself
This is my pride, what makes up my core
I will not let my fire be put out; not yet
I will keep going, and I will never stop
(Please be) Dakara moshi kono mune ga
(With me) Michi ni mayou hi ni wa
Mirai e no tobira wo hiraite hoshii
This is what they call fate.
the way we keep on shining together.
Let us keep our gazes locked
so it will not fade away.
(Please be) Maybe the day will come
(With me) that we will lose our way
while looking for the door to the future.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off
So do not let go of my hand.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
